title: [Large-Scale] Cognitive Process Analysis in Multimedia Learning: Utilizing Eye-Tracking Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic learning theories and multimedia design principles
context.additional_context: Addressing visual representations of mathematical concepts in a BYOD environment, measuring learning outcomes through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners can interpret eye-tracking data to analyze attention distribution patterns during multimedia learning.
Learners can explain eye-movement metrics in relation to Cognitive Load Theory.
Learners can propose personalized learning designs based on visualization materials of mathematical concepts and learner interaction data.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
